#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

inline int euclid(int m, int n)
{
    int rem=0;
    while(n%m)
    {
        rem = n%m;
        n = m;
        m = rem;
    }

    return m;
}

int main()
{
    int n,num,den,gN, lD;
    cin>>n;

    cin>>num;
    gN = num;

    cin>>den;
    lD = den;

    for (int i=1; i<n; i++)
    {
        cin>>num;
        gN = euclid (gN, num);

        cin>> den;
        lD = (lD*den)/(euclid(lD, den));
    }

    cout <<gN<<"/"<<lD<<endl;

    return 0;
}
